SELECT pcum.url_list urllist, pcum.user_id userId, pcum.password, pcum.user_name userName, pcum.user_full_name userFullName, pcum.phone_no phoneNo, pcum.email, pcum.dept_id deptCd, (select dept_name from com_dept_m b where b.dept_id = pcum.dept_id) as deptName, pcum.sub_dept_id,
(select sub_dept_name from com_dept_sub b where b.dept_id = pcum.dept_id and b.sub_dept_id = pcum.sub_dept_id) as subDeptName, pcum.address_line1_info addressLine1Info, pcum.address_line2_info addressLine2Info, pcum.address_line3_info addressLine3Info, pcum.SUPPLIER_ID supplierId, pcum.HOSPITAL_ID hospitalId FROM com_user_m pcum WHERE pcum.user_id = #{userId} AND pcum.use_flag = 'Y'
SELECT id, rid, savebutton, updatebutton, deletebutton FROM com_role_button WHERE 1=1 AND rid = #{rid}
SELECT auth_code authCode FROM com_auth_user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT userdept.dept_id code, dept.dept_name VALUE FROM com_user_dept userdept, com_dept_m dept WHERE userdept.dept_id = dept.dept_id AND user_id = #{userId}
SELECT drug.drug_type_code code, drug.drug_type_name value FROM tb_drug_type drug WHERE drug.drug_type_code like 'S09' || '%' AND drug.drug_type_lvl != 1 ORDER BY drug.drug_type_code
SELECT DEPT_NAME "loginDeptName" FROM COM_DEPT_M WHERE DEPT_ID = #{userDepartment}
select count(*) from email where `read`=1 and owner=#{user_id} and ownertype=2
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM carinfo WHERE DATE_FORMAT(outofwarranty , '%Y-%m-%d' )<= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE() , '%Y-%m-%d' )
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM archive WHERE DATE_FORMAT(expirationdate , '%Y-%m-%d' )<= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE() , '%Y-%m-%d' )
